docs.snippet: A software technique could help oversee the spread of disinformation.
It does not take much to get Americans to turn against one another. Partisan polarization was well underway before Moscow got involved.

headline.print_headline: With Red and Blue Already Clashing, Russia Was Happy to Antagonize
